title: This Artificial Intelligence (AI) Giant Is Up 72% Since the Start of 2025, and It Looks Even More Attractive in 2026 (Hint: Not Nvidia)
description: Management just raised its long-term outlook, and it has plenty of good reasons to do so.

title: WA lawmakers advance AI regulations to prevent discrimination
description: OLYMPIA — Consumers may gain stronger protections against risks of algorithmic discrimination from artificial intelligence after HB 2157 was adopted as amended and advanced out of committee.

title: Tech Giants Seek Massive AI, Digital Infrastructure Push In Budget 2026
description: Technology firms are expecting the Union Budget 2026-27 to push for development of the AI ecosystem, including innovation, digital infrastructure, across sectors, and provide liquidity in the market for its adoption.

title: Who is Amelia, the British AI girl everyone is talking about?
description: A UK government-funded anti-extremism avatar, 'Amelia,' designed to educate youth, has been co-opted by the far-right. Hijacked and rebranded using advanced AI, the character now promotes extremist views and has even been monetized into a cryptocurrency. This viral phenomenon highlights the challenges of digital literacy and the weaponization of online content.

title: Tim Cook Says Apple’s AI Advantage Is What Other Tech Giants Overlook
description: In the company’s latest earnings call, Tim Cook frames privacy as Apple’s competitive edge in the AI boom.
